# Learn about API authentication here: /r/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api library(plotly) trace1 <- list( x = c(0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8), y = c(0, 3, 6, 4, 5, 2, 3, 5, 4), type = "scatter" ) trace2 <- list( x = c(0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8), y = c(0, 4, 7, 8, 3, 6, 3, 3, 4), type = "scatter" ) data <- list(trace1, trace2) layout <- list( showlegend = TRUE, legend = list( x = 100, y = 1 ) ) response <- py$plotly(data, kwargs=list(layout=layout, filename="legend-outside", fileopt="overwrite")) url <- response$url
